duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and assemble case carts of instruments, implants, supplies, and equipment in collaboration with various hospital staff.
Analyze data related to equipment and materials tracking software to ensure efficient instrument management.
Collaborate with OR charge nurse, tissue coordinators, and vendors for required instruments and equipment.
Select preference cards for procedures and ensure the coordination of changes related to instrumentation and surgical supplies.
Maintain the sterile processing department, work hands-on with medical equipment and instrumentation, and handle supply carts and instrument sets.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited Sterile Processing Technician school
Certified Sterile Processing Technician CBSPD or CRCST
